summary: This is a forwarded email chain from August 11, 2019, regarding an Epstein-related Suspicious Activity Report (SAR). It appears to be internal FBI communication, with an SSA (Supervisory Special Agent) in New York forwarding information and referencing an ongoing operation.

persons.name: SSA FBI New York
persons.context: The sender of the forwarded email, providing Epstein SAR information and offering updates on the progress of an operation.

events.title: Epstein SAR Email Forward
events.description: An FBI Supervisory Special Agent in New York forwards an email containing Epstein-related Suspicious Activity Report (SAR) information and mentions an ongoing operation.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated August 11, 2019, concerning a Suspicious Activity Report (SAR) related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The communication involves an FBI Supervisory Special Agent (SSA) based in New York.
The SSA references an ongoing operation ('the progress of the Op'), indicating active investigative work related to Epstein at that time.
The email is forwarded, suggesting the information was being shared internally within law enforcement.
